title: Physint - Kojima Productions Announcement | State of Play 2024
description:
Hideo Kojima joined Herman Hulst to announce a brand new Action Espionage project which will be both a new game and movie in partnership with Sony. Kojima will be revisiting the genre that made him famous with the Metal Gear franchise nearly 40 years ago.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5

description:
Koei Tecmo revealed the first glimpse of gameplay for its upcoming third-person samurai game, Rise of Ronin which includes sword combat, flight, and more in this open-world action game coming to PS5 in March 22, 2024.

description:
Dragon's Dogma 2 is coming on March 22, 2024 and Capcom has released a breand-new gameplay trailer highlighting all the new action coming to the fantasy RPG sequel.

title: Metro Awakening - Announcement Trailer | State of Play 2024
description:
Deep Silver announced the latest entry into the Metro series, Metro Awakening, a PS VR 2 title that returns to the post-apocalyptic Soviet world of Metro. Coming to PS VR 2 in 2024.

description:
Dave the Diver is coming to PS5 and he's bringing his friend Godzilla along in an official collaboration. The hit scuba sim Dave the Diver is coming to PS5 in May 2024.

description:
Sonic Generations returns but this time with Shadow the Hedgehog. The latest Sonic game, with Shadow, drops this Autumn 2024 for both PS5 and PS4.

title: Tekken 8 - Official Accolades Trailer
description:
Take another look at Tekken 8 in this latest trailer, and see what some critics are saying about the fighting game. Tekken 8 is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Has a Post Credits Kevin Conroy Tribute
description:
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League pays tribute to the late actor Kevin Conroy with this post-credits scene. Spoiler Warning!

#IGN #Gaming #SuicideSquad

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone - Official Season 2 Multiplayer Launch Trailer
description:
Season 2 has arrived to the latest installment in the first-person shooter franchise with Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3. Players can enjoy three new 6v6 maps including Stash House, Vista, and Departures alongside the Zombie-filled Hordepoint mode that brings the undead to Multiplayer. Season 2 for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 arrives on February 7.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty

title: NBA Infinite - Official Release Date Trailer
description:
Check out gameplay from NBA Infinite in this latest trailer for the upcoming free-to-play PvP mobile basketball game. Three-time NBA All-Star Karl-Anthony Towns will serve as the icon athlete for NBA Infinite, and he will be featured in the game alongside stars including De'Aaron Fox, RJ Barrett, Tobias Harris, Andrew Wiggins, and Jrue Holiday. NBA Infinite will be available on iOS and Android devices on February 17, 2024.

#NBA #Basketball #Gaming

title: Alone in the Dark - Official 'Everything You Need to Know' Trailer
description:
Alone in the Dark is a psychological third-person horror game developed by Pieces Interactive. Explore everything you need to know about this reimagined version of Alone in the Dark as players face challenges, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth at the center of Derceto Manor. Alone in the Dark is launching on March 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#AloneInTheDark #Gaming #IGN

title: PDP Riffmaster Wireless Guitar Controller - Official Reveal Trailer
description:
PDP's latest product, the Riffmaster, is a wireless guitar controller compatible with Rock Band 4 and, eventually, Fortnite Festival coming to retail stores this spring.

#Gaming #Guitar #IGN

title: PDP Riffmaster First Look
description: We go hands-on with the PDP Riffmaster, a new guitar controller for Rock Band 4 and Fortnite Festival.

title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Official Developer Gameplay Deep Dive
description:
Join The Chinese Room’s Creative Director, Alex Skidmore, and TCR Community Manager Joshua Mathews for a deep dive into the game mechanics of Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2. Watch as Skidmore and Mathews introduce the playable character Phyre from the Brujah clan, explore Seattle, and showcase an early in-game mission where Phyre infiltrates an abandoned warehouse to uncover clues about the mysterious mark on their hand. We also see exploration, stealth, and brawling gameplay, and get a breakdown of abilities, enemies, and more in this mission from the upcoming first-person action RPG.

Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 will be available in fall 2024 on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#VampireTheMasquerade #Gaming #IGN

title: Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer
description:
Watch the latest action-packed Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 trailer to see some brand new Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 gameplay featuring Phyre and Fabien, a look at the game's combat in action, and more from the upcoming first-person action RPG sequel.

Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 will be available in fall 2024 on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#VampireTheMasquerade #Gaming #IGN

title: Earthlock 2 - Official Cinematic Trailer
description:
Earthlock 2, the open-world action-RPG sequel to the 2016 game inspired by classic JRPGs, was first announced back in 2020. After a lot more time spent in development, its developers are reintroducing it with this very cool cinematic trailer.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Madzik - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Madzik is a new fantasy-set co-op hack-and-slash with a dose of '80s vibe from BKOM Studios. It's due out this year, but you can play a demo of it as part of Steam Next Fest starting on February 5.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake - Official Graphics Comparison (2013 vs. 2024) Trailer
description:
Check out this graphics comparison between award-winning game director Josef Fares' first game, 2013's Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons, and its 2024 remake in Unreal Engine 5 by developer Avantgarden Games. The Remake will be released on February 28 for PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#ign

title: Terminator: Dark Fate – Defiance | The Final Preview
description: Terminator: Dark Fate – Defiance is based on an alternate reality of the most recent Terminator movie, and despite the time travel-based shenanigans, there are nevertheless some interesting ideas glimmering in the gaps beneath its synthetic flesh in this slightly clunky but overall competent squad-based RTS. Previewed on PC by Leana Hafer.

title: Universal Orlando Resort is bringing back The Dark Universe! #tomcruise #themummy #universalstudios
MLB The Show 24 - Official Cover Athlete Reveal Trailer
description: MLB The Show 24 is the latest installment in the legendary baseball franchise developed by Sony San Diego. Take a look at the reveal trailer for the game's cover athlete, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. MLB The Show 24 is launching on March 19 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Xbox Game Pass, and Nintendo Switch.

title: Summoners War x The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Official Cinematic Trailer
description:
Check out the Summoners War: Sky Arena x The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt collaboration trailer. The latest collaboration event brings iconic characters from the fantasy RPG The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt to the action RPG Summoners War: Sky Arena as part of Summoners War: Sky Arena's 10th anniversary celebrations. Geralt, Ciri, Yennefer, and Triss from The Witcher 3 will be available to summon in Summoners War: Sky Arena from January 31 through April 1. Additionally, a new collaboration dungeon will be available, featuring foes from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, like the Leshen, Fiend, and Archgriffin. During the collaboration event, you can also play Gwent, as the card game from The Witcher 3 also comes to Summoners War: Sky Arena.

#IGN #Gaming

Diablo 4 - Official Lunar Awakening Trailer
description:
Diablo 4 is the latest installment in the iconic action RPG franchise developed by Blizzard Entertainment. A new limited-time event called 'Lunar Awakening' is in store for players to enjoy bringing new Lunar Shrines, bonus XP and movement speed, and plenty of rewards to earn within Diablo 4. The Lunar Awakening Limited-Time Event runs from February 6 through February 20 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#ign #diablo4
